SELECT w.id AS waitingMessageId, w.eventType, m.id AS messageId FROM waiting_event w, message_instance m WHERE m.tenantid = #{tenantid} AND w.tenantid = #{tenantid} AND m.messageName = w.messageName AND m.targetProcess = w.processName AND m.targetFlowNode = w.flowNodeName AND m.locked = FALSE AND w.locked = FALSE AND m.handled = FALSE AND w.active = TRUE AND w.correlation1 = m.correlation1 AND w.correlation2 = m.correlation2 AND w.correlation3 = m.correlation3 AND w.correlation4 = m.correlation4 AND w.correlation5 = m.correlation5 AND w.kind = 'message'
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
